group_1.textLeft: We began as bodyguards,
to protect Ayame's friends while@protecting ourselves...
As well as maintaining our neutrality...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I feel like things were going well until@what happened to Sae...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I believe we were able to change our@way of life as Magical Girls...
In addition to that... Ayame, it made you@think about your future, didn't it...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...but...

group_1.textLeft: Actually, it's made me think about my future,@as well.
Knowing that there are Magical Girls out there@with their own dreams...
I've been thinking about children who are in@the same situation as us...
And now I want to support those who can@act for the sake of those children.

group_1.textRight: Konoha...
You've really found what you want to do@in the future...

group_1.textLeft: I'm embarrassed to admit this, but...this is the@first time I've really thought about my future...
I was content to just keep being together@with you two...
What is it, Ayame? You're smiling...

group_1.textRight: I just...I dunno! I'm just so relieved!
I realized Konoha's the same as me...!
I was wonderin' if it was okay for me to be thinkin'@about somethin' that wasn't for all of us...
It made me feel kinda guilty, so...

group_1.textLeft: Same here...
All I ever thought about was the three of us.
I thought it would be a betrayal to@focus on myself...

group_1.textRight: That's not true. I felt the same way.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, you too Hazuki?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
As I was talking with the other girls...
I thought that I'd like to do something to@improve the environment around us.
For Magical Girls, and for orphans...
I haven't figured out what kind of work would@make that happen yet, though...

group_1.textLeft: I see...so you found motivation, too...
...If all three of us have found hope in@our work as bodyguards...
That makes me want to keep working as@a bodyguard more than ever.
I don't want to give up on a future where we@can make a difference.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah...
We could always give up later if we@really want to...
I'm scared that I won't be able to@protect someone again, but...
I...wanna try one more time with you two...!
And if we give up now, I'd feel bad for Sae...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, even if it's tough, let's do our best.
We'll continue as we always have...
When times are tough, we'll hold each other's@hands tight, and always support each other...

group_1.textRight: Oh! That's what the director told us!

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. You remembered.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah. Let's try it again.
For Sae...for our own sakes...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, both of you...!
Let's continue working as bodyguards@in Kamihama, the three of us together...!
